name: SubstanceSpecification.structure.molecularFormulaByMoiety
title: SubstanceSpecification.structure.molecularFormulaByMoiety
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Specified per moiety according to the Hill system, i.e. first C, then H, then alphabetical, each moiety separated by a dot
element.definition: Specified per moiety according to the Hill system, i.e. first C, then H, then alphabetical, each moiety separated by a dot.
